name: Sentimental Journey
overview: Sentimental Journey is a board game released for the Sony PlayStation in 1998 as a spin-off from the popular dating simulation series Sentimental Graffiti, released by NEC Interchannel. In this game, the player can choose a girl from the series and let her find the love during a board game. There are different boys to meet and different mini games and special blocks to make the game more interesting. Up to four players can select girls in the multiplayer mode.
